src_text: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.

src_text: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
ref_text: Akanzi aiva nemakore ekuma20. Bieber akati "kunyange zvazvo ndaisavapo uye ndisina kukonzeresa njodzi iyi pachangu, mhuri yemufi wacho ndiri kufunga nezvayo uye ndiri kuinyengeterera.
hyp_text: Riito imi wemunhu wakapera muvano we 20. Mhuri dzeBieber dudziro: 'Ndakati ndiri kubva kubva, ndakati ndiri kufamba nemunhu wemunhu wese wokuti zviripo, ndakakuti ndakabva nemiriro yeMwari nemiriro yeBaba reMwari pahure reMwari.'

src_text: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
ref_text: "Ndakarasikirwa nasisi vangu neshamwari yavo, uye pandakanga ndiri munzira paiva nevanhu vaviri vakaremara vaiva mumawiricheya, vanhu vachingovasvetuka nekuvasunda", akadaro Armand Versace.
hyp_text: Ndakanyanya ndakaberekwa ndakamboita, ndakakora mvana wekare wangu na mukadzi wemunhu, ndakakora vanhu varikuda kubva kwevhu, vanhu varikuruka kubva kwevhu, kubva kwevhu kana kubva kwevhu, Armand Versace ari kuita.

src_text: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
ref_text: Piramidhi yakakura yakavakwa seremekedzo kuna Farao Khufu, uye akawanda emapiramidhi madiki, makuva, nematembere zvakavakirwa kupa rukudzo kumadzimai aKhufu nevamwe vemhuri yake.

src_text: One of the most noteworthy recent examples of this was the North Atlantic campaign of WWII. The Americans were trying to move men and materials across the Atlantic Ocean to help Britain.
